artist: Painter: After Anthony van Dyck; Engraver: Schelte Adams a Bolswert; Publisher: Gillis Hendricx
description: half length portrait of Mary turned left and looking up left; hands raised in front; clouds background
inscription:
Signature, Title, and  Inscription

below image in black: MARIA MATER DEI / Anton van Dyck pinxit.   S. a\'Bolswert scuplsit / Gillis Hendricx excud. Antwerpiae  | on sheet in pencil: 2-506
title: Mary Mother of God
